WorkItem.Description:
If a StringLiteral starts exactly before EOF (just a quote followed by EOF), parsing causes an NullReferenceException in both VS line mode and normal mode.
Reproducing test cases and probable fix attached in the patch.
WorkItem.Summary: StringLiteral crashes when started just before EOF

Comments.Message:
oopps... sorry, accidentally deleted patch file - can you please reattach it again?
will investigate this anyway and fix in the next code drop
thanks!
There it is (it is a pity codeplex does not notify about issue comments).
Applied the patch, the issue is fixed
